title: Interpretation of a dream about pomegranates for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pomegranate fruit in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is buying a lot of pomegranates, and they are cheap. This indicates that she will end her life due to the annoying problems that she was living with, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And seeing an unmarried woman in a dream that her fiancé was giving her A pomegranate in a dream and she was happy about it. It shows that she will get married in the near future, and she will live happily with her fiancé. An unmarried woman who sees in a dream that she is buying pomegranates, and they were expensive in the dream. This indicates that she will go through a bad period in her life, but she will succeed in getting rid of it. Including. What if an unmarried girl dreams of finding many pomegranates in her home? This is an indication that she will live a period full of goodness and happiness, God willing, in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing apples in a dream and its meaning according to Nablus. Interpretation of seeing pomegranates in a dream for a married woman, if the woman is A married woman dreams that there are a lot of pomegranates in a dream and she eats them. Good things appear in her life during this time and that she will live happily ever after. And if the woman’s husband gives her two pieces of pomegranates in a dream and she is happy with them. This indicates that she will give birth to twins very soon, and she will be happy with her children. God willing. A married woman who looks at a pomegranate in a dream but does not touch it is an indication that she is living with a serious lack of something in her life, but she has not been able to make up for it. If a married woman stores pomegranates in her home, she is very happy in a dream. This means that she She is trying to protect her home from crises and troubles, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing pomegranates in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that her ex-husband gave her a lot of pomegranates, she announces that she will return to her ex-husband in the coming period with great happiness in her life. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream means that the deceased wanted to eat from them. Pomegranates in a dream. It indicates that the crises in her life will end, and that she will live with great comfort. The divorced woman who sees a lot of pomegranates in a dream and is happy to see them in a dream. He declares that he will get rid of the financial difficulties he is experiencing, God willing, at this time. The dreaming divorced woman who sees a man Anonymous: She gives her dream a pomegranate and takes it from him. It indicates that she will marry a good man in her life soon, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a pomegranate in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is looking at a pomegranate and is unable to buy it in the dream. It appears that there is a crisis that this man is experiencing. And he tries to end it quickly. And the dreamer sees in a dream that he is going through a difficult period in his life, and eats pomegranates in a dream. He announces that he will get rid of a difficult situation that he was experiencing in his life during this period. As for the dreamer who sees that he is giving his wife a lot of pomegranates in a dream, and he is happy. This is an indicator. It is clear that he will get rid of some crises during this time. Likewise, the dreamer saw that he was eating a pomegranate while he was in a new place in his dream, and he had not seen it before. It explains that he will move to a new place in his life, perhaps his home or his work, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of seeing a parrot in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a parrot running in a dream Seeing a parrot indicates that he is escaping from the cage in the dream to freedom, leaving and starting a new life. This vision also shows the dreamer’s desire to learn about different regions and new aspects of the world. If one sees a parrot escaping from the cage and flying high in the sky , this is a sign of success and success in life. Interpretation of a dream of a gray parrot in a dream. See the point of a gray parrot in the event that there is a non-serious relationship in the dreamer’s life or he is experiencing problems in his marital life. This vision also indicates that the fortuneteller is making a deal that is not a guaranteed profit. What if she sees A married woman: A gray parrot in her dream is evidence of the failure of her marriage and that her husband is an unjust man. If a man sees in his dream that he is buying a gray parrot, this is a sign that he is trading in a losing deal and causing him problems. As for an unmarried girl who sees a gray parrot in her dream, this is a sign of... She is on the verge of a marriage full of problems and will not expect success. Seeing a parrot standing over the house in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a parrot speaking in her dream, this is an indication that many problems will arise in her home. But if she sees in her dream a parrot standing silently in the house, this is a sign that The problems that already exist in her home will soon end. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is raising a parrot in her home, this is evidence that her husband is corrupt, and is oppressing his family, and that she is helping him in that. But if a woman sees that she is buying a parrot, this is an indication from the market of a large profit and livelihood that her husband will earn From his trade, God willing. But if a married woman sees a parrot dying in her dream, this is a sign of the death of someone dear and dear to her, and God knows best. Seeing a green parrot for single people. Seeing a parrot in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of a deceitful man approaching her with the intention of catching her, especially if the parrot is colorful and its colors are bright. And dazzling. And if the parrot that the girl saw in her dream was talking, this indicates many differences and problems that appear in her life cycle. While if an unmarried girl saw a parrot standing silently and not making any sound, this is a sign that the problems and quarrels in her life will stop. What if The girl saw a single woman. In her dream, she raised a green parrot, beautiful in color and shape, well-spoken and kind. This is a symbol of her future husband, who will be an honest man of origin. Seeing a man feeding a parrot in a dream Scientists differed in the interpretation of seeing a parrot in a man’s dream, as they interpreted contradictory interpretations among themselves. Among them are Who says that this vision indicates the presence of an evil friend who pushes the visionary to the path of deviation and corruption. Others say that this vision indicates the lawful livelihood that the dreamer will earn from his trade or work in general. If one sees in a dream that he is teaching a speech parrot, this is a sign To travel or search for knowledge. Likewise, if a person dreams that he is feeding a parrot, this is a sign that he is accompanying an evil person who helps him oppress people. What if a man sees that he is slaughtering a parrot in his dream and eating the meat?

title: I know the interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake: It seems very disturbing. Snakes are among the most dangerous reptiles and cause a lot of fear and panic for all people. As for seeing them in dreams, do their connotations indicate good or bad? We will explain through our article full of information and all clear indicators so that the sleeper’s heart is at peace. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake. Many of the most important interpretation experts said that seeing a yellow snake in a dream indicates the presence of many people who harbor all hatred and evil for the dreamer and are planning great conspiracies so that he falls into it and does not do so. . can go out. He must deal with them with extreme caution during the coming periods. Many of the most important interpretation scholars have also confirmed that if the dreamer sees the yellow snake in his dream, this is a sign that he will suffer from many health crises that will greatly affect his psychology and health in the coming days. He also said that many Leading scholars of interpretation say that seeing a yellow snake in a dream indicates that he is surrounded by many people whom he trusts a lot and who are not trusted to keep secrets and are not able to be among his family. Close people and he must completely cut them off from his life. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a yellow snake in a dream is an annoying dream that indicates bad changes that will occur in the life of the dreamer and that will make him feel very sad and extremely anxious in the coming periods. As the great scholar confirmed Ibn Sirin said that if the dreamer sees the presence of a yellow snake in his dream, this is a sign of the approach of an evil fraudster who wants him to fall into great problems and crises. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a yellow snake during the dreamer’s sleep indicates that he will be exposed to many major calamities that will fall on his head. In the coming periods. The Secrets website for dream interpretation is a website specialized in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world. Just write a website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of a yellow snake for a single woman. Many prominent experts in the science of interpretation said that seeing a yellow snake in A dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she went through several stages of intense sadness that greatly affected her health and psychology during this period of her life. Many important jurists in interpretation have also confirmed that seeing a yellow snake in a fortuneteller’s dream indicates her trust in many people who He has not been trusted to keep many of her secrets, and this will cause her to have many major disagreements with the fortune teller. Her family in the next few days and she has to be very careful in the coming periods. Many leading scholars and interpreters also explained that if an unmarried woman sees the presence of a yellow snake in her bedroom during her dream, this means that a disreputable young man is close to her and will be the reason for her reputation being severely tarnished. You must stay away from it completely. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake for a married woman. Many of the most important interpretation scholars said that seeing a yellow snake killed in a dream for a married woman indicates that she has gotten rid of all the evil people who wanted to destroy her.

title: Interpretation of tattoos in a dream Seeing tattoos in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a tattoo of a single girl, married to a pregnant woman, whether it is green, or removing a design on the arm, neck, hand, body, face, leg, back, heart, arrow, scorpion, or spider, By Ibn Sirin Tattoo. Interpretation of tattoos in a dream. Tattoos in waking life, a change in the skin or skin color, and this in a dream may indicate a change in the viewer’s personality towards a trait or character that is compatible with the tattoo designed and its location. Tattoos in a dream symbolize personal beliefs and convictions, and indicate identity and identification. With the things and animals that we draw on the body. A tattoo in a dream is the language of the body and its being, and the symbol engraved on the body is one of the repressed forms of expression that cannot be revealed in any way, as the designs are the inclinations and desires of the beholder. A tattoo in a dream expresses our desire to Distinction and unity with admiration for others. We draw shapes on our bodies in a dream to express ourselves through the features of a tattoo or an engraved symbol. Tattoos in dreams are praiseworthy if they are writing that has meaning, meaning, and connotation, and long if they are a collection of incomprehensible and sometimes arbitrary letters, words, and shapes. A tattoo in a dream indicates important and fateful decisions that the viewer will make soon, and in this context, according to the psychological approach, it is an unconscious writing characterized by ambiguity because its owner does not want to reveal it except to himself. A tattoo using henna in a dream is something worthy of praise for women in particular and indicates good luck and wishes that will come true. SoonIf you see in your dream that you are drawing or carving a snake on your hand, chest, chin or stomach, then in reality you are a person who is sure that there is deception around you and that you are trying to avoid it with tact and cunning. You are against it. Tattoos in dreams can sometimes be a warning message for the dreamer, as it predicts the presence of certain dangers They must be taken into account. A scorpion tattoo in a dream may indicate a deviation in the viewer’s behavior, characterized by aggression towards those around him. Erasing or removing a tattoo in a dream can indicate that the viewer is surrendering or abandoning a principle, and the expression of this dream can be positive if The tattoo that was removed is a snake, scorpion, or spider. A tattoo on the arm can indicate a lack of confidence and security, especially if the tattoo is of a predatory animal such as a lion or a bird of prey such as an eagle or an eagle. A tattoo on the face, forehead, or cheek indicates the dreamer’s desire to stand out and be unique. The viewer may be seeking fame, even if it is vulgar. Seeing a tattoo in a dream can indicate events that are difficult to erase from memory, and these memories are often painful, because a tattoo on the waking body causes severe pain, and is done using a sharp tool such as Needles etc. If you see someone you know who has made a tattoo on his arm, hand or anywhere on his body, then in the interpretation he is trying to tell you something very important, but he cannot do it in an alert state. These messages are sentimental or sentimental, especially if the tattoo contains an image of s

title: Interpretation of a dream about sweet potatoes

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sweet potatoes in a dream for one girl: When an unmarried girl sees sweet potatoes in a dream, this is a sign that God Almighty has made her affairs easy. She will also live a life full of prosperity. Picking sweet potatoes for an unmarried woman in a dream is a good sign that she will get married. Whoever fears God and will be happy with him, God willing. Seeing single women eating sweet potatoes is evidence of the fulfillment of their aspirations and dreams. If a single woman is frying sweet potatoes in a dream, this is an unfavorable sign for her. It may bring her illegal money from her research, and she should To repent to God. And resort to good deeds and stop the forbidden money, and God knows best. For a girl who boils sweet potatoes in a dream, it means that she is doing a good job. Buying sweet potatoes from a good vision is a sign of upcoming news that brings positive changes. It will also come With many benefits, God willing. If a girl is roasting sweet potatoes, this indicates death and the end of the difficult things that happened to her. Seeing sweet potatoes in a dream for a single woman is a sign of contentment and happiness in life. Also, seeing eating baked potatoes is a sign of goodness and nourishment coming from The work that God knows best. See also: Interpretation of eating potatoes in a dreamInterpretation of seeing sweet potatoes in a dream for a married womanSeeing sweet potatoes in a dream for a married woman is considered a good sign that a lawful life comes to her from some profits. Likewise, when a married woman sees sweet potatoes in her dream. It is only a sign of marital happiness and the enjoyment of happiness in life. Planting sweet potatoes in a dream brings happy news about pregnancy. Especially for those who suffer from infertility or delayed childbearing for a very long time. Seeing potatoes that are not cooked well after boiling indicates that he does not have patience and that he is always... In a hurry. Buying sweet potatoes in a dream from the market is an indication that the financial situation is not expanding and that you are experiencing difficulties in life. But this will change, thanks to Almighty God. In the event that a married woman sees herself baking sweet potatoes. Evidence that God will comfort her after Hardships signified by her from a long time ago. Eating potatoes in a dream, and their taste is delicious, indicates her husband’s guidance and good condition, God willing. Having tasted suffering with him, she must commit to always praying for him. Seeing sweet potatoes that a woman eats while she is still not Cooked. An indication of the emergence of marital disputes, and one must pray a lot to God so that problems do not worsen and things become undesirable. As for mashed potatoes and the woman was eating them, it is a sign that problems will disappear by God’s command. Frying sweet potatoes in a dream for a married woman He does not deserve praise, because it is a warning. The warning is against the corruption that is within him, and he resorts to God Almighty. She begged him to pray for her to repent of her anger and do many good deeds. Interpretation of seeing sweet potatoes in a dream about a man and its meaning about

title: I dreamed that I fell into a deep well, and the color of the water was black

preview.html: I dreamed that I fell into a deep well, and the color of the water was black. Dreams are fantasies that a person sees during his sleep, and many people see that he falls into a hole or a well, so they resort to interpreting this dream on websites, and there are many indications of this dream, some positive and others negative. In general, a well in a dream indicates knowledge and money, and today through our article we will give you all the details and interpretations related to the interpretation of the dream in which I dreamed that I fell into a deep well, the color of the water is black. Interpretation of a well in a dream It may happen that a person sees a well in his dream or falls into it. A well, and the dreamer feels afraid of this dream, so he searches on the Internet for an interpretation of this dream. Here we present to you some interpretations of the dream of seeing a well in a dream, which are as follows: Seeing a well in a dream may indicate money and knowledge and may be a sign of imprisonment. But if you see yourself taking water from a well, this indicates success and progress in life. And when you see a well in a dream Empty, this indicates that the dreamer does not trust his relatives. If you see yourself falling into a well in a dream, this may indicate that you are facing some troubles and problems in life. As for seeing a dry well, this is a sign that the fortuneteller is tired of his work. And if you see a dry well, this is a sign that the fortuneteller is tired of his work. Your image is upside down in the well, as this is a sign of sadness, destruction, or death, and this is God, the highest and best. Interpretation of a dream about falling into a well: A dream or dream is considered a successive series of events that a person sees during his sleep, as the dream differs from one person to another according to the psychological state. First: When you dream that you Falling into a deep well, this indicates the exhaustion and tension that she is going through during this period. Second: If an unmarried girl sees me falling into a hole or a well, this is a sign to her that she is thinking a lot about her future affairs. Third: A man falling into a well in a dream indicates the presence of... Bad friends in his life and must be avoided. Fourth: If the dreamer falls into a well with no water in it, this indicates illness and loss of money. Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream for a married woman: A married woman sees many dreams in her dream, including seeing a well or falling into it, so she resorts to the Internet to obtain interpretations and details. About this dream, and here we will tell the married woman all the interpretations of the dream to see the well, which are as follows: When a married woman sees a deep well in her dream, this is a sign of family stability and understanding between her and her husband. If the well’s water is clean, but if the well’s water is impure, this indicates However, she will face some problems in her life. As for falling in a dream for a married woman, it indicates exhaustion, illness, and loss, and this God is Most High and All-Knowing. But if she sees herself digging a well, then this dream is a sign of the responsibility and difficulties she faces, but she will be able to do so, God willing. Also, seeing a well in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of bad company in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a well in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a well in a dream for an unmarried girl has many interpretations. And some of them

title: I dreamed that I slaughtered a sheep, but no blood came out from Ibn Shirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I slaughtered a sheep, but no blood came out from Ibn Sirin. It is one of the hated visions because of the details it contains that are not accepted by the interpreter and the dreamer and what he sees in particular. It carries many connotations depending on the state of the fortuneteller and the details that are not accepted by the interpreter. A person sees an animal like himself in a dream, and through the Encyclopedia Net website we examine the meanings of a dream about slaughtering a sheep in more detail and explanation. The interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a sheep and no blood comes out according to Ibn Sirin is one of the dreams that has a strong and clear meaning for its owner, and Ibn Sirin mentioned the repercussions of this dream , which we mention in the following points: It indicates that a family member will be exposed to some problems and worries but can survive them. It indicates that the dreamer obeys his parents and cares for them in their old age. Ibn Sirin claims that slaughtering a sheep in a dream without blood is a sign of the collapse of anxiety and symbolizes It also means returning home or releasing a prisoner in the coming days. Also, killing a sheep in a dream without blood indicates the dreamer’s success in overcoming life’s obstacles and reaching a bright tomorrow. What is the interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a sheep without blood? It is one of the visions that contains within it meanings. The beautiful and desirable one that awaits the dreamer. It indicates the goodness and benefits that accrue to the dreamer, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Whoever sees that he slaughtered a lamb without blood, this indicates that the dreamer is fair to his parents and takes care of them in their old age. Some scholars also suggest that the interpretation of a dream about a sheep in a dream depends on The size of the sheep at the time of slaughter. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a sheep and blood flowing for an unmarried woman. When an unmarried girl sees a sheep slaughtered and blood flowing, this indicates that she was proposed to by a person who has an attractive personality and can meet all her needs and live with him a happy and stable life. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is slaughtering a sheep, this indicates the problems that She faces it and needs someone to advise her. Seeing a sheep being slaughtered and blood coming out of it in an unmarried woman’s dream means good news that the dreamer will receive it soon, God willing. What does it mean to slaughter a sheep in a married woman’s dream? If the woman is married and sees a sheep being slaughtered in her dream, this symbolizes Carrying a male child who is fair to her and wants to obey her. Likewise, it could be a visit to the Sacred House of God for the purpose of performing Hajj or Umrah rituals. It is an indication that her husband takes care of her and covers all the needs she desires and that he supports her in all areas of her life. Seeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dream indicates Also to the death of a family member after a tragic accident. Interpretation of dreams about slaughtering a sheep and blood coming out. Seeing a sheep slaughtered and blood coming out of it indicates that things will become easier and worries will go away soon, so slaughtering the sacrifice is a sign of kindness, and distributing its meat to the poor and the poor. Spreading the feeling of happiness within them. If a married man sees this dream, it indicates the birth of a male child in the current period. In the event that the dreamer desires God’s repentance for him and sees a sheep being slaughtered in a dream, this means that God has accepted his repentance. A dream about slaughtering a sheep is one of the visions that It causes confusion and anxiety for many people and has multiple interpretations

title: Learn about the interpretation of a cat in a dream from Ibn Sirin, a black cat in a dream and a kitten in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a cat in a dream: In fact, the cat symbolizes beauty and sophistication in the eyes of some. There are those who take care of it in their home and those who find it scary, and this is what we call Zoophobia, so seeing it has important meanings for the dreamer that can benefit him in his life, or warn him of something. We will meet the interpretation of a cat in a dream and what has been stipulated by the majority of jurists and interpreters. What is the interpretation of a cat in a dream? Never see a cat in a dream without feeling afraid that seeing it is a sign that the viewer is dealing with some traitors and hypocrites who are not in good health, but we find that his dealings with them are very cautious in the context of his work, so he is not afraid of them. If the one you see in the dream is a woman, then this It reflects what she feels inside, as she praises herself and is proud of what she does, and this is viewed by everyone as arrogance, so she should mediate her feelings and not show this. So that some people do not understand it in a bad way and stay away from it. Selling it in a dream indicates the money that the dreamer spends. He is wasting his money on important and trivial things, so he is keen to buy only what he wants. As for its dismissal, it is good news for the dreamer who is keeping all judgments out of his way in a hidden way. For the dreamer to see that he has turned into a cat, this indicates that he has performed useless actions that do not benefit him, so we find that the dream is a sign of staying away from it. Whatever happens, he will not regret his choice, and he will enjoy a huge diet. His vision can explain some bad qualities that the dreamer has, such as neglecting his family, dishonesty, and that he must leave these qualities without returning to them again, and then he will feel a beneficial change In his life. His voice may indicate his constant disagreements with his family or wife, so he should beware of repeating these problems so as not to leave accumulations in their hearts. Rather, he should try to find the basic problem and solve it. Then he will find that his affairs are different from those before, and he will be able to restore peace and stability to His life again. The cat in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin explains to us multiple meanings that save us from confusion and anxiety when seeing cats, as he says that in a dream there are many signs that we must pay attention to. In the vision, he will conquer his enemies and get rid of his problems. It is known that every successful person is surrounded by enemies who hate and despise him, so in a dream this bad meaning is the presence of enemies lurking around the dreamer to see any mistake he makes in his life or work and benefit from it. But the dreamer's awareness and interest in his work makes him not find a suitable opportunity to destroy him, and he will even rise to his work to become a higher rank. A cat scratching or scratching it in a dream may be an undesirable sign, as it may indicate that his enemies will be able to defeat him, but they will not defeat him, and he will pay attention to them. In the first act. The white cat looks wonderful in reality, but in the dream it develops into a cunning one that surrounds the viewer of some people, but they do not show this malice in them, but the dreamer’s insight and intelligence allow him to easily recognize them and they must be very careful in dealing with them. When a cat appears, it tries Attract the dreamer's attention in different ways and do not calm down

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about heavy rain in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain: Everyone loves rain and loves its smell as well. Rain washes the air, roads and streets, and everyone who sees rain in a dream promises this vision. We find those searching for the interpretation of a dream about heavy rain in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain by Ibn Sirin. Through a different website, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about rain. Heavy rain in a dream from many respected interpreters, and we will explain to us many of the results of this vision: The great scholar Ibn Sirin indicated that the interpretation of seeing heavy rain in a dream is generally good news for whoever has the vision. If one man sees heavy rain in his dream, then this vision She tells him that he will get a lot of money and marry a beautiful girl. Whoever sees in a dream heavy rain, and has an absent son or an absent relative, this vision portends that the absent person will return to him. And if a married woman sees in a dream heavy rain, this dream portends her imminent pregnancy, and God knows best. Who He saw heavy rain in his dream, and he is sick. This vision foretells that he will soon recover from his illness. If an unmarried girl sees heavy rain in a dream, this vision may be good news for her upcoming marriage. If the rain is accompanied by lightning and thunder, this vision tells her that she will suffer From feeling lonely for a long time. And if a married woman sees in her dream that she is crying in the rain, then this vision tells her that her pregnancy is approaching. Read also: What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Shirin dead in a dream while he is silent? Interpretation of a dream of heavy rain according to Al-Nabulsi. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi confirmed that seeing a dream of heavy rain In a dream, it is good news for many good deeds. But he said that if the rain is very heavy and causes people or homes to drown, then this vision indicates that its owner will suffer a great loss in his money or business. If someone sees heavy rain in his pajamas and this rain makes him feel In the cold, this vision warns him that there is a deceitful person near him and that he trusts him. And whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking rainwater, this is evidence of goodness if the rainwater is clean. But if the rainwater is unclean, and he drinks from it, this is evidence of evil. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain for one girl. If an unmarried girl sees that she is walking in the rain except in a dream, then this vision tells her that she will achieve her dream, which she has been struggling to achieve for a long time. This vision can be interpreted as telling her that she will marry a good man. Soon. And if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is crying in the rain, and this girl is already suffering from anxiety, then this vision foretells her almost God’s comfort. Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees heavy rain in her dream, this means that her family will receive A lot of money. It is possible that the vision tells her about the health of her fetus and that her birth will be facilitated by God’s command. Some scholars and commentators have suggested that the interpretation of a pregnant woman’s vision of heavy rain in a dream may tell her that she will give birth to a male child. The interpretation of a vision of heavy rain for a divorced woman if she sees a woman in

title: Interpretation of a bag in a dream for one girl

preview.html: Seeing a bag in a single girl’s dream, whether it was a travel bag or a suitcase. I found a brown, black, or white bag. I dreamed that someone would give me a bag by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. A bag in a dream is one of the dreams that brings us many interpretations. A handbag is different from travel bags. We will learn about the meaning of seeing bags in a dream, through the following lines, for a girl and a married woman, and also for a pregnant woman who uses bags for travel and other important things. In public life.Interpretation of a bag in a dream: Seeing the disappearance or theft of a bag in a dream symbolizes revealing a secret to him, as well as losing his job, and the vision may symbolize difficulties and pain to which the dreamer is exposed. Seeing cosmetics in a bag symbolizes deception and cunning. Finding a bag and leaving it In a dream, it symbolizes that you are not taking advantage of the fortuneteller’s opportunities in reality. Finding a bag of school supplies symbolizes the dreamer’s enjoyment of knowledge and jurisprudence. As for seeing a school bag, it symbolizes the pursuit of desires. The white bag symbolizes marriage or a new job. As for a bag Green travel symbolizes success in the dreamer’s journey, God willing. Seeing a red bag symbolizes positive and romantic feelings between the dreamer and his life partner. Seeing a backpack symbolizes the dreamer’s pursuit of his goals and projects. Also, seeing a small bag symbolizes the viewer’s confidence in himself. Also, seeing The paper in the bag for the fortuneteller is a symbol of the presence of secrets belonging to the fortuneteller, and he is afraid to reveal them to others. Also, seeing red or green bags symbolizes the happy and joyful events that are expected to happen to the fortuneteller, and God knows best. Interpretation of a bag in a dream for a single woman. If you see a bag in a dream for a girl Unmarried, it means engagement or marriage. Seeing a bag is considered one of the most promising visions for a single girl. To see a small bag symbolizes marriage, God willing. As for seeing a travel bag, it symbolizes the fulfillment of goals and desires, and God knows best. The blue color of the bag also symbolizes a relationship soon, God willing. The bags also symbolize changes in professional, emotional, and family life. The small bag also symbolizes marriage, God willing. The backpack in a dream symbolizes It also indicates the girl’s success in her professional life or in scientific and academic life. Among the signs that indicate a girl’s marriage in a dream, a travel bag and seeing her new bag is good news for any girl who has waited a long time to get married in order to meet her life partner. While white is a sign of engagement, blue is simply knowledge and pink is love and passion. The black color shows a failed marriage accompanied by divorce. Interpretation of the suitcase - YouTube
